I've been working in the cyber security industry for last 7 years with my most recent roles focused on security compliance & monitoring and vulnerability management. My recent interest in secure software development was sparked by an innate desire to identify and automate vulnerability remediation and monitoring efforts. ‚≠ê My goal  is to create custom security solutions for companies so they can refocus excess resources (such as man hours, funding and training) to other areas that support their organizational goals. Let me know how I can contribute to your company's security posture üíú

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: The application I created using React that shows a 'Gallery of Horned Beasts', using a JSON file as a datasource. It also allows users to filter the beasts based on the number of horns.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: In this project, I build an app for a cookie shop that sells cookies with a hint of fishy goodness. This project/app helps Pat, a cookie store owner, track cookie inventory across multiple store locations.

projects.title: BusMall Market Analysis
projects.description: BusMall is a lean startup that needs to carefully watch its expenditures. I created this app to help BusMall do market analysis on proposed products to test their potential customer interest. This project displays products to users and captures their interests in products that Busmall will sell.
